<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Your Dream Job]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
 Do you have amazing skills to offer but none of our open positions were the perfect fit?  Don’t worry – we’re growing fast, so speak up, introduce yourself and let us know how you could contribute to 310 Nutrition!  
  

  
 Tell us your story, name your role, write your job description and let us know why you want to work here and what you’d want to do (giving that we’re not actively searching for your position, we encourage you to be convincing).  If you persuade us and or a role comes up that matches your skills and qualifications our recruiting team will reach out.  
  

  
 What it takes to make it at 310 Nutrition: 
  

  

  
+  Fast Learner – We’re looking for team members who thrive on applying their knowledge, learning new technologies and don’t believe in one-size-fits-all solutions. 
  

  
+  Give a Damn – You take pride in the work you contribute and care about the people you’re doing it with and the customer you’re doing it for. 
  

  
+  A Customer Advocate – You strive to empathize with the customer and are always seeking to better understand their experience, find new and innovative ways to solve customer pain points and view problems from their perspective in order to solve them. 
  

  
+  Open and Transparent – You’re able to give and receive feedback and believe that it is a cornerstone of a team’s success when there is open and honest communication. 
  

  
+  Team Player – You see value in approaching problems collaboratively but feel confident to work autonomously. 
  

  

  
 Company perks 
  

  

  
+  Competitive salary and benefits package! 
  

  
+  Casual work attire! 
  

  
+  Free catered lunches! 
  

  
+  Company outings! 
  

  
+  Dog friendly office! 
  

  
+  Cold brew & sparkling water on tap! 
  

  
+  Fun atmosphere full of growth opportunities! 
  

  

  
 We look forward to hearing from you!  
  

  
Powered by JazzHR
  

<script id="detrack" defer src="https://d2e48ltfsb5exy.cloudfront.net/p/t.js?i=0,1" data-g="28F013F3F2DD45E3AA12067D628083DA105"></script>]]></description>
        <link><![CDATA[https://de.jobsyn.org/28f013f3f2dd45e3aa12067d628083da105]]></link>
        <imagelink>https://d1rap9luh07sve.cloudfront.net/companylogos/Jazz46945.gif</imagelink>
        <guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[Jazz46945-1221305]]></guid>
        <industries />
        <expiration_date>2022-04-20</expiration_date>
        <employer><![CDATA[310 Nutrition]]></employer>
        <location><![CDATA[Los Angeles, CA, 90006, USA]]></location>
        <city><![CDATA[Los Angeles]]></city>
        <stateprovince><![CDATA[CA]]></stateprovince>
        <countrycode><![CDATA[USA]]></countrycode>
        <postalcode><![CDATA[90006]]></postalcode>
    </job>
